docs.text: Modern Macro ¶ Aug-19 (Thu): Modern macro , Here we talk about methods: how to set up a general equilibrium model and characterize its equilibrium. Aug-24 (Tue): Sequential trading and Arrow-Debreu Overlapping Generations ¶ Aug-26 (Thu): Model Aug-31 (Tue): OLG model (continued) Sep-2 (Thu): Dynamics and steady state , example (not yet active), PS1 , due Sep-9, solution Sep-7 (Tue): Efficiency and Social Security , RQ (review questions, not to be handed in) Sep-9 (Thu): Bequests Sep-14 (Tue): Money in OLG models , PS2 , due Sep-21, solution Infinite Horizon, Discrete Time Models ¶ Sep-16 (Thu): The growth model Sep-21 (Tue): Dynamic programming . For your reference: Dynamic programming theorems , Notes on Dynamic Programming Sep-23 (Thu): Competitive equilibrium , RQ , PS3 , due Sep-30, solution Sep-28 (Tue): Cash in advance models , RQ , PS4 , due Oct-5, solution , Example: Asset pricing , RQ , Two sector models , RQ , (Skipped this year), Infinite Horizon, Continuous Time Models ¶ Sep-30 (Thu): Solow model Oct-5 (Tue): Optimal control Oct-12 (Tue): University Day Oct-14 (Thu): The growth model Oct-19 (Tue): Competitive equilibrium , Dynamics and phase diagrams ( partially skipped this year), RQ Oct-26 (Tue): Money in the utility function , PS5 , due Nov-2, answers Oct-28 (Thu): Perpetual youth , Aggregation issues (skipped this year) Endogenous Growth ¶ Nov-2 (Tue): Endogenous growth: AK model , RQ , Phase diagram (skipped this year), Increasing varieties , RQ Nov-4 (Thu): Increasing varieties, part II Nov-9 (Tue): Knowledge spillovers and scale effects , PS6 , due Nov-16, answers Nov-11 (Thu): Quality ladders , Quality ladders with firm dynamics Stochastic Growth ¶ Nov-16 (Tue): Stochastic optimization , Dynamic programming -- we will not talk about this in class. Think of it as a simple user guide to the results that are out there. Nov-18 (Thu): Asset pricing , Extensions , RQ , PS7 , due never, answers Nov-23 (Tue): Stochastic growth model , RQ
